title: FREEDOM FOR THE BODY / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
Dr. Marco Paret will achieve a true freedom for the body of this woman, using non-verbal hypnosis techniques. Non-verbal hypnosis can be very transformative in a positive way. These images are from his Masterclass in Russia. Dr. Marco Paret is doing many Masterclasses in different countries. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
